Header: 1 SLSR Troops Carry Out Community Project
Content: As part of its ongoing Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) projects, 573 Brigade troops under the 57 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi launched a self-help (Shramadana) programme to clean Uriyan pre-school premises on Thursday (2). Commanding Officer, 1 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) of the 573 Brigade carried out the project with his troops and a group of villagers in the area. Under the guidance of Major General Pradeep de Silva, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division and also under the supervision of the Commander 573 Brigade, organized the project as a community-oriented gesture.
